programme.title: 鳳凰午間專列
programme.desc: 《鳳凰午間專列》: 鳳凰中午的強檔新聞節目, 採取泛中華的報道態度, 關注中國內地的新聞, 也關注香港、台灣以及國際的新聞, 視野更廣闊, 話語空間亦突顯其獨特之處。節目簡潔、實事求事、快人一步, 將新聞帶給正在享用午餐的您, 讓您在休息時段毋須讀報而能輕鬆地接收全球最新出爐的新聞資訊。

programme.desc: 《總編輯時間》: 鳳凰總編輯重點編選和剖析一天最值得注意的頭條新聞, 解構事情的來龍去脈, 讓觀眾以評論員的眼光看世界, 深度瞭解重點事項。

programme.title: 新聞今日談
programme.desc: 《新聞今日談》: 節目針對當天最熱門時事問題, 在觀眾最關注的時刻即時作出評論, 讓觀眾更洞悉事件的真相。

programme.title: 鳳凰焦點新聞 2300
programme.desc: 《鳳凰焦點新聞》: 聚焦重大時政議題, 重大社會事件和新聞熱點, 原創性挖掘更多時事與背景, 分析梳理新聞的前因後果, 人物命運, 呈現權威觀點。

programme.title: 鳳凰洲際快車
programme.desc: 《鳳凰洲際快車》是鳳凰衛視子夜時段的新聞資訊節目, 為您帶來兩岸三地, 以及國際社會的大小新聞、最新動態和局勢發展。

programme.title: 鳳凰正點播報 0100
programme.desc: 《鳳凰正點播報》: 每天全球各個角落、各個領域最有價值、新鮮熱辣的新聞大事, 《鳳凰正點播報》為你追蹤報導。第一時間為你送上, 第一時間讓你知道最新發展。

programme.title: 金石財經
programme.desc: 《金石財經》精確對準匯股走勢, 鎖定最新金融行情, 結算每日熱門財經話題, 即日即時評論各項消息。

programme.title: 鳳凰正點播報 0100
programme.desc: 《鳳凰正點播報》: 每天全球各個角落、各個領域最有價值、新鮮熱辣的新聞大事, 《鳳凰正點播報》為你追蹤報導。第一時間為你送上, 第一時間讓你知道最新發展。

programme.title: 鳳凰財經日報
programme.desc: 《鳳凰財經日報》每日精選當天最矚目的經濟數據, 世界各地的政經新聞, 並廣邀各方專家進行連線點評, 提供獨到精闢的見解。亦會向觀眾提供全方位的新聞視覺, 率先把握時局帶來的機遇。

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer 第1季第5集 -How Flying Cars Became A Billion
programme.desc: Flying cars have largely remained science fiction, until now. A new generation of electrified aircraft is attracting the attention of investors and venture capitalists around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer 第5季第2集
programme.desc: This episode profiles Duolingo CFO Matt Skaruppa, who has the world's leading language-learning app poised for a new phase of growth powered by AI.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer 第5季第3集
programme.desc: AT&T CFO Pascal Desroches has partnered with CEO John Stankey to restructure the company around a core of fibre and 5G wireless connectivity.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer 第5季第7集
programme.desc: Gina Goetter is the CFO and COO of Hasbro. She's the architect of the company's transformation, diversifying its manufacturing footprint and investing in Hasbro's video game ambitions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Screentime: The Business Of Pop Culture
programme.desc: At Screentime, the icons and innovators behind today's entertainment revolution take the stage. The agenda: AI's creative takeover, the streaming wars, and what's next for legacy media.

programme.title: Bloomberg New Economy: Thriving In An Age Of Extremes
programme.desc: Candid conversations with CEOs, investors, and government leaders focused on how to navigate and prosper in this age of economic uncertainty. Hosted by Erik Schatzker in Singapore.

programme.title: Best Of The Bloomberg Women, Money & Power Event
programme.desc: Highlights of the event which brings together the most influential female voices in finance from around the world to discuss the biggest themes facing the future of business.

programme.title: Leaders With Francine Lacqua 第1季第1集
programme.desc: Francine visits Finland, where the threat from Russia looms large. She speaks to President Alexander Stubb about Finnish resilience and how his country is preparing for an uncertain future.

programme.title: Leaders With Francine Lacqua 第1季第2集
programme.desc: Francine meets Ray Dalio on OceanX in the port of Nice for the UN Ocean Conference. They speak about radical transparency, building and leaving one of the largest hedge funds and what's next.

programme.title: Leaders With Francine Lacqua 第1季第3集 -Leading A Trillion
programme.desc: Francine talks with Franklin Templeton CEO Jenny Johnson about how to steer a $1.6 trillion business amid the rise of AI, shifting politics and booming private markets.

programme.title: Leaders With Francine Lacqua 第1季第4集
programme.desc: Former UK Prime Minister Theresa May speaks with Francine Lacqua about Vladimir Putin, and her approach to leadership in a world seeing a rise in 'strongmen.'

programme.title: The Circuit 第3季第1集
programme.desc: Emily Chang goes inside Stargate, a historic $500 billion bet on the future of AI. She speaks with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman and Softbank CEO Masayoshi Son about their hopes for the project.

programme.title: The Circuit 第3季第2集
programme.desc: Inside Stargate (Part 2). Emily goes inside Stargate, a historic $500 billion bet on the future of AI. She speaks with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman & Softbank CEO Masayoshi Son about the project.

programme.title: The Circuit 第3季第3集
programme.desc: Microsoft: The Tech Giant's 50 years - Part 1. Bill Gates, Steve Ballmer and Satya Nadella speak about Microsoft's journey to global powerhouse, and its battle to outpace rivals in the AI era.

programme.title: The Circuit 第3季第4集
programme.desc: Microsoft: The Tech Giant's 50 years - Part 2. Bill Gates, Steve Ballmer and Satya Nadella speak about Microsoft's journey to global powerhouse, and its battle to outpace rivals in the AI era.

programme.title: The Circuit 第3季第5集
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Melinda French Gates in Seattle to discuss how she's navigating her next stage as a philanthropist and investor.

programme.title: The Circuit 第3季第6集
programme.desc: Salesforce's Marc Benioff. Emily meets Salesforce Co-Founder & CEO Marc Benioff to discuss the rise of AI agents and what it's like to run a very meme-able global tech company.

programme.title: The Circuit 第3季第7集
programme.desc: Power lawyer Alex Spiro discusses how he navigates the high-stakes world of litigation on behalf of famous clients like Elon Musk, Jay-Z, Megan Thee Stallion, and Alec Baldwin.

programme.title: The Deal With Alex Rodriguez And Jason Kelly 第3季第1集
programme.desc: Alex and Jason sit with Georgia Tech Athletics Director J Batt during March Madness to discuss the buzz around college athletics, including NIL and the transfer portal.

programme.title: The Deal With Alex Rodriguez And Jason Kelly 第3季第5集
programme.desc: The hosts sit with Magic Johnson to discuss how he was able to make the transition from being a legendary basketball player to a successful businessman.

programme.title: The Deal With Alex Rodriguez And Jason Kelly 第3季第9集
programme.desc: Super Bowl winner and Goldman Sachs Managing Director Justin Tuck talks about the pressure of playing in New York and his transition from football to finance.

programme.title: The Deal With Alex Rodriguez And Jason Kelly 第3季第13集
programme.desc: The hosts talk with USC Annenberg School for Communication and Journalism Dean Willow Bay about her investment in Angel City Football Club and her tenure on 'NBA Inside Stuff.'
